overview: Two friends, Fritz and Theodor, make the acquaintance of Christine and Mizzi, who are also friends. Fritz is immediately captivated by Christine, who is bashful and modest as opposed to the eager, effervescent Mizzi. But even though the love between the two grows, Christine is not the only woman in Fritzâ€™s life. His affair with a married woman will prove to have fatal consequences. (stumfilm.dk)
title: Love's Devotee
